ComicInfo.Title: The Executioner; The Monster's Revenge!; Revenge!; Who Stalks the Vampire?
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Executioner: Francis Tourneau is an executioner to King Louis XVI of France in the year 1769. He labors to find a more efficient means of executing prisoners. A physician named Joseph-Ignace Guillotin provides him designs for a mechanized decapitation device. The device (dubbed the guillotine) is put into use, but a revolution takes place and the prisoners storm the Bastille. They capture Tourneau who subsequently becomes the guillotine's first victim.
The Monster's Revenge!: Frankenstein's Monster takes his revenge on Victor Frankenstein by killing his wife Elizabeth.
Revenge!: The Werewolf fights and kills Max Grant.
Who Stalks the Vampire?: Taj and Rachel prevent Drake's suicide and he joins their cause.
